message: I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money!
Come on, Bob, meet me halfway!
Okay, Alice, let's be real. 50/50, take it or leave it.  We're both losing out with this inflation!
You're losing value, Bob. Better take this deal!
This is getting ridiculous, Alice.  I'm taking a hit from inflation.  Meet me a little closer to the middle and let's end this!
Inflation is killing your share, Bob. This is my best offer yet!
